thread.title: Mustafa Numan Fakihoglu
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordeeld door Mustafa Numan Fakihoglu

author: Mustafa Numan Fakihoglu
title: Mustafa Numan Fakihoglu
text: The reciever was not at home. The delivery guy left the package in front of the door in a crowded street and of course it was stollen. I have sent an e-mail to Euroflorist but never got an answer or refund.
